name: Royal College of Physicians
goal: The Royal College of Physicians is a British professional body dedicated to improving the practice of medicine, chiefly through the accreditation of physicians by examination.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology
